mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDR_NUM, ADDR_ROAD, ADDR_DETAIL ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{addrNum}, #{addrRoad}, #{addrDetail} )
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDR_NUM, ADDR_ROAD, ADDR_DETAIL, AUTH FROM MEMBER WHERE AUTH = #{auth}
SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDR_NUM, ADDR_ROAD, ADDR_DETAIL, AUTH FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW = #{memberPw}, NAME = #{name}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, ADDR_NUM = #{addrNum}, ADDR_ROAD = #{addrRoad}, ADDR_DETAIL = #{addrDetail} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
